attributes.comment:
Sirs:

I am very concerned that this proposal will work to discourage potential
international adoptions. International adoption is a very complicated, emotional,
and expensive process. There are millions of orphans world-wide in desperate
need of homes. We must, therefore, make it as affordable and convenient as
possible to families that desire to bring these precious ones home. I understand
fully the need to adjust for cost increases. Is there some way to make the
adoption process exempt from the fee increases? Discouraging adoption is a
very important and critical potential negative impact of these fee changes that
should be carefully weighed and considered. Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,

Lori J. Cohen MD

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Lon J. Cohen
